Delete_Installment.description: Flag to indicate to delete the installment. When the flag is set to True, Workday deletes the installment and associated installment lines.

Due_Date.description: Installment Due date.  Due Date is read-only and the system derives it based on Payment Terms.

Invoice_Memo.description: Invoice Memo.  This should only be supplied to override the same value on the installment's schedule and must be used in conjunction with Override Invoice Header.

PO_Number.description: PO Number.  This should only be supplied to override the same value on the installment's schedule and must be used in conjunction with Override Invoice Header.
